sub_title: CCO Global / Global Sales & Marketing Director at DMT Environmental Technology (Member of Board of Directors)
summary:
GENERAL ROLE DESCRIPTION:
The objective in my role is to drive global development and execution of a commercialization strategy with a strong focus in the Renewable Energy Segment, Biogas Upgrading and Desulphurization. Building a commercialization infrastructure and organization to drive further market adoption of the company’s products and be responsible for revenue growth of the organization. 

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
Leadership: Deliver strategic leadership for defining the commercial path to growth and profitability of the company and the establishment of an effective growth process and infrastructure. Develop collaborative working relationships within the organization in pursuit of the of the company’s overall business goals. This involves activities relating to marketing, sales, product development and customer service to drive business growth and market share.

Marketing: Lead development of the company’s marketing strategy with an emphasis on achieving market penetration and sales growth in alignment with the overall business strategy. 

Sales: Develop and implement the company’s sales strategy across key market segments to ensure that the company identifies and optimizes a clear path to aggressive growth. Assess, build and manage an array of necessary channels capable of delivering on the company’s growth objectives.  This includes Direct sales, Agents, Partners, Distributors and Lead sales channels to meet and exceed revenue targets. Implementation of Sales processes/structures and CRM systems which are in alignment with each other for a proper funnel management to ensure focus and drive business growth.

Business Development: Develop a strategy and provide leadership for global business development opportunities. Originate and manage business development opportunities that are consistent with the overall business strategy for revenue growth.

SPECIALTIES: 
Direct Sales, Marketing, Business Development, Product Development, Project Management & Service. These specialties are in conjunction with an extensive background of industrial process engineering developed in the Food & Beverage Industry and Renewable Energy Market (Biogas Upgrading).
